message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I believe it would be a valuable asset to you.  I'm asking for $20,000, considering its unique features and benefits.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget considerations, but $12,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
